alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 10:52AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, central Holt and northwestern Wheeler Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1052 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chambers, or 23 miles southwest of O`neill, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, O`Neill, Atkinson, Chambers, Amelia, Emmet, Sunfish Lake, Midway and Scottville. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 284 and 312. Highway 281 between mile markers 167 and 203. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
